definition: brisket/belly beef/spongy meat from cow's underside and neighboring ribs/see 牛腩[niu2 nan3] esp. Cantonese/erroneously translated as sirloin

sentences.english: When she woke up, she told me my fats made the best pillow ever.
sentences.chinese: 她睡醒以後說，我的肚腩當枕頭真是絕了。

sentences.english: I need to do 200 sit-ups everyday to get rid of my spare tire.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: In order to take the warts in my belly away ,I need to making 200 sit-ups everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: Ham is brawny and little stomach Nan, it is the problem of affliction of major now girl.
sentences.chinese: 大腿粗壯以及小肚腩，是現在大部分女孩苦惱的問題。

sentences.english: I do two hundred sit-ups every day in order that reduce my tripe.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: Yeah, he is so cute and he has got a pot belly.
sentences.chinese: 見到了，他太可愛了，而且還有個“大肚腩”。

sentences.english: Day and night they continued to approach me, poking and prodding at my belly.
sentences.chinese: 每天每夜，小孩都喜歡靠近我，然後戳戳我的肚腩。

sentences.english: Green tea ad, will belly into the chest, good exaggeration.
sentences.chinese: 綠茶廣告，將肚腩變成胸部，好誇張。

sentences.english: Everyday I do hundreds of crunches to flatten my abs.
sentences.chinese: 我每天做仰臥起坐數百次，就是想打平我的肚腩。

sentences.english: Factoring in the amount of abdominal fat revealed a link between big bellies and breaks in the women.
sentences.chinese: 腹部脂肪的量揭示了女性大肚腩和骨折的關係。

sentences.english: I have to done two hundreds situp to make my belly gone.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: I need do two hundred sit-ups everyday in order to minish my belly.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

definition: to put on weight/to get fat (a sign of prosperity, so a compliment)
to put on weight/to get fat
swim ring/swim tube/(fig.) (coll.) spare tire (roll of fat around the waist)
